Text:
I'm having no luck with this one at all. I've downloaded others, put them in the Models folder and they have worked perfectly, but this one just does not seem to work.

The clips appear in the VGHD thing, I double click to play, and it just does not work. I try my previously downloaded ones and they work fine, for some reason this DVD just will not play.

Any help? Anyone else had the same problem and fixed it? Would be greatly appreciated.
yeah same prob here... folders from Data folder are missing... maybe they could be included in an update
